title: Reese Witherspoon bundles up in a blue robe to film Little Fires Everywhere with Joshua Jackson
text:
She's returning to the small screen in a television adaptation of Celeste Ng's novel Little Fires Everywhere.

And Reese Witherspoon wasn't quite ready for action as she strolled around set wearing a plush blue robe in Los Angeles on Friday morning.

The 43-year-old actress kept covered up in her nightwear while co-star Joshua Jackson chatted it up with the production crew.

Warming up: Reese Witherspoon wasn't quite ready for action as she strolled around set wearing a plush blue robe in Los Angeles on Friday morning

Reese appeared to be wearing a black-and-white long-sleeved plaid top underneath her long robe.

She added even more comfort to her ensemble with a pair of fuzzy slippers with floral decals across her feet.

Witherspoon's platinum blonde hair was slightly parted to the side and worn straight across her shoulders.

Most comfortable on set: The 43-year-old actress kept covered up in her nightwear

What to do: She carried a reusable pink water bottle in one hand and her iPhone in the other while passing through craft services

She carried a reusable pink water bottle in one hand and her iPhone in the other while passing through craft services.

Joshua was in a spirited mood as he used his animated hands while talking to a member of the production crew.

The 41-year-old actor wore a long camel-colored wool peacoat with black trousers and matching shoes.

Jovial: Joshua was in a spirited mood as he used his animated hands while talking to a member of the production crew

Peeks of a striped brown-and-white tie peered out from underneath his jacket, which he wore with a white collared button down.

Joshua portrays Reese's husband in the series which also stars Kerry Washington and focuses on the fallout of a suburban community in Ohio, according to Variety.

Witherspoon became familiar with the novel after choosing the story as one of her book club picks, then securing the rights for adaptation through her production company, Hello Sunshine.
